data.text: @sriram_ri @Chloe_Melas I’m not clicking or watching CNN until they fire everyone involved with this fiasco. I encourage you and others to do the same. #boycottCNN #firechloemelas #fireanhuiphung or whatever her name is

@Chloe_Melas Why do you even post ? , you lost all credibility way back, as a reporter i would just reconsider everything i said and fucking apologize for trying to ruin others career and start fresh.
